text: <!here|@here>: As you probably saw, I’m going to be hosting a bike maintenance class on Thursday the 21st. Bring your bike, I’ll provide everything else, including beer. Complete novices and experienced wrenches alike are welcome. Please take a moment to accept the invite so we can plan for enough space and supplies.
I said ‘maybe’ but I’m off the next day, who am I kidding?
I totally forgot to check vaca calendars before we booked
that’s okay! unless there are a bunch of other people who can’t come, don’t change plans on account of me
and then we can follow along later
